name: worthkeeping
description: Capture what you did. Remember what mattered.

scripts.copy-wasm: mkdir -p public/wasm && cp node_modules/onnxruntime-web/dist/ort-wasm-simd-threaded.jsep.wasm public/wasm/ && cp node_modules/onnxruntime-web/dist/ort-wasm-simd-threaded.wasm public/wasm/ && cp node_modules/onnxruntime-web/dist/ort-wasm-simd-threaded.jsep.mjs public/wasm/ && cp node_modules/onnxruntime-web/dist/ort-wasm-simd-threaded.mjs public/wasm/
